column2: States line up to scrutinize Aetna's $33 billion Humana deal NEW YORK/WASHINGTON U.S. insurance regulators and state attorneys general are lining up to scrutinize Aetna Inc's proposed $33 billion takeover of rival Humana Inc for potential harm to consumers
